wikipedia_page.main: Richard Jones (born 26 April 1969 in Usk) is a Welsh former footballer who made nearly 200 appearances in the Football League playing as a midfielder for Newport County, Hereford United and Swansea City. He then spent six seasons with Barry Town, including one season as player-manager, and also played for Merthyr Tydfil and Haverfordwest County.
